The beach has footbaths and a toilet booth, it also has access for people in wheelchairs. title: (30369) La Unión - 1 R-3
description: Parking in an urbanization that stopped a few years ago and the construction of the houses has not been finished. Long parking areas everywhere. Trash cans everywhere, very clean. There are nearby playgrounds and sports court. Approximately 10 minutes walk from the Likör 43 factory, the cult Spanish brand. In the town bar you can buy bread and have an early breakfast at approx 7.00. You can book tastings and guided tours on a half-board basis. You can take an excursion to an old abandoned mine (approximately an hour's walk away). You can walk through large areas of agricultural crops.

title: (30351) Alumbres - 8P Calle Malecón
description:
Parking in the pretty town of Alumbres.
From the parking we can see the beautiful old windmill.
In the town there are many services available supermarket. pharmacy, bakery, restaurants, bars, etc.
From the town we can visit the city of Cartagena or Ciudad de la Union to even the Mar Menor without having to move our motorhome or camper using the FEVE suburban train that stops in the town every half hour.
From the parking lot we can go for a walk around the town we can see mining areas, etc.
also tracks to ride with our bike.
A kilometer or so from the town is the via ferrata Cabezo de la porpuz, a very entertaining via ferrata for beginners.

title: (03191) Torre de la Horadada - 42 Calle Ancla
title_short: (03191) Torre de la Horadada - 42 Calle Ancla
description: Large square in a residential area, close to restaurant . no facilities

title_short: (30392) E.S. Repsol La Manga Oil Torreciega

name: Area Autocaravanas Cartagena
title: (30310) Area Autocaravanas Cartagena
description:
Open from September 1st ⚠️Closed in the summer months June/July/August⚠️
Bus No. 7 at 300m every 10 minutes to the historic center 5 km from Plaza España.
Bike lanes to the city center.
Taxi service.
Information
 Lots of fun and services (shops, restaurants and markets) 400m away in Polígono res Santa Ana.
Price that includes, in addition to the water change, Wi-Fi, showers and there is even a small living room with a coffee maker and microwave where you can watch TV or sit and chat if the day is rainy.
Dogs are welcome and they have a large garden. Automatic door and 24-hour video surveillance. Laundry, sinks, barbecue, showers, toilets, wifi.|
Normal pitch: price/day (wifi, showers, drinking water loading and unloading, all included).
XXL plot: price / day (electricity, wifi, showers, drinking water loading and unloading, all included).
Ask about discounts on stays of 15 days and 30 days.

description: Flat fallow land with eroded steep driveway.. Sufficient ground clearance condition..

title_short: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 44 Paseo Playa de Levante
description: Ground parking on the beachfront and next to the beach bar. Quiet at night, you can sleep without discomfort.

title: (03191) Pilar de la Horadada - Calle Estrasburgo
title_short: (03191) Pilar de la Horadada - Calle Estrasburgo
description: A quiet place and five minutes from the beach walking there is plenty of park

title: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 1 Calle G
description: No view but large empty tarmac area next to where a supermarket used to be. used for access by locals. Level scrub land next to tarmac. 2 supermarkets within 5 minutes walk.

title: (30389) Cartagena - 8 N-345
description: Small, level, quiet parking lot near a small beach, overlooking the bay. By the water there is a small restaurant with a selection of fish and meat and further towards the beach there is a beach bar. Spent a day and night here with no problems. Passers-by greeted us warmly.

title: (30370) Cartagena - 1 Calle Brezo
description: Behind the supermarket, ideal to rest or go on Sunday at the cabo de palos market

title: (30364) El Puerto - 6 Calle del Puerto
description: Small beach in the bay of Portmán. To spend one night, quiet and without noise.

title: (03191) Pilar de la Horadada - 1Z Calle Jorge Manrique Mp
title_short: (03191) Pilar de la Horadada - 1Z Calle Jorge Manrique Mp
description: Ample parking, no service, but near the beach. Tuesday is prohibited by the market

title: (03191) Pilar de la Horadada - 1A Calle Río Llobregat
title_short: (03191) Pilar de la Horadada - 1A Calle Río Llobregat
description: Wonderful place with wonderful view on the beach! Free parking from September to June, open all year. Toilets available in the restaurant bar on the beach, you can spend the night there without any problem and it is very quiet outside the summer season. Large campsite nearby (Camping Lo Campo)

title: (30389) Atamaría - 1 Calle la Zorrera
description: Clifftop parking with panoramic views, there is a restaurant there which is open during tourist season. A 1km gravel track to get there.  A town nearby with restaurants.

title: (30385) Cartagena - Unnamed Road
description: Calblanque public parking. out of season open all the time, in high season I think it closes. very quiet place with a lot of space. next to very beautiful coves for bathing or practicing water sports. there is a gr route that takes you throughout the park and passes through the parking lot

title: (30385) Cartagena - 1 Caserio Farola
description: Dirt / sand parking next to beach bars and beach, good option if the asphalt parking lot is full and quieter, at the beginning of the path that goes to the lighthouse. next to a nice pier and the beach, the only downside is that the sand stains a lot, otherwise a very quiet night in the middle of August. There are bathrooms next to the beach bar, but they are closed at night. on the beach people stay late in the summer. shade in August until 9:30 in the morning.

title: (03191) Pilar de la Horadada - 2 Calle Un Act Mp 2 T H
title_short: (03191) Pilar de la Horadada - 2 Calle Un Act Mp 2 T H
description: Nice place and well maintained and tidy so please keep it that way! Close to the beach with fabulous views. It brought us right here, but apparently there is no place for sewerage yet found.

address.street: 2 Calle Un Act Mp 2 T H

title: (30310) Cartagena - 6 Calle Conesa Calderón
description: Laundry with 3 machines and 2 very clean dryers

title: (30385) Cartagena - 1 Caserio Farola
description: Good. Parking bay of Portman. Close to small beach with beach bars. Not suitable for over 6m

title: (30370) Cartagena - 6 Camino Cala Reona
description: Spacious ground parking. Direct access to the beach. We can bivouac if we do not leave blinds or table. Dogs can swim so well educated. Alas, this beach and its surroundings are what I call sue an environmental disaster: the water is very dirty at the edge, there fleet of plastic waste and even feces. The surrounding area is a real shock despite both visible garbage.

title: (30204) Cartagena - 1 Ronda Ciudad de la Unión
title_short: (30204) Cartagena - 1 Ronda Ciudad de la Unión
description: Hypermarket parking. It has about 150 seats. In front of a Repsol that has laundry. An MC Donald's right in front. The center is about 3km walking.

title: (30591) - 16 Calle Murcia
description: Parking along the road. Very well

title: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 10 Calle los Palangres
title_short: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 10 Calle los Palangres
description: Port at the foot of the sea, close to shops and cafes.

title: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 1 Calle Punta Cocedor
title_short: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 1 Calle Punta Cocedor
description: Wonderful place , quiet and 10m from the water. Beautiful . Avoid in summer.

title: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 100 Avenida de las Calas
title_short: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 100 Avenida de las Calas
description: Very quiet parking. Breathtaking cliff view. There is only room for 1 camper and 1 car. Beautiful walk on the cliff. Possibility to swim nearby

title: (03191) Pinar de Campoverde - 29 Calle Tejo P C
title_short: (03191) Pinar de Campoverde - 29 Calle Tejo P C
description: Parking near sport facilities and restaurant at the edge of the town of Pinar de Campo Verde. Garbage and recycling bins are on the parking. Nice walks along the river with small canyons. Quiet.

title: (30310) Cartagena - 5 Finca la Perdiz
description: Very cheap gasoline station diesel GASOLEO A0.98ct / Possibility of washing for motorhome

title: (30365) Cartagena - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet beach, ideal for camping on the beach, it seems like a free will fishing settlement ... It does not have any services, access by a dirt road through buildings in ruins of a mine and you have to go through a rather narrow aqueduct , but I went through with the motorhome without any problem ... A little careless cleaning, for lack of civility of the people, but spectacular ...

title: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 1 Calle Cabo Falcón
title_short: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 1 Calle Cabo Falcón
description: Beautiful views in La Manga, without services, very quiet and always accompanied by campers.

title: (30203) Cartagena - 7D Calle Juan Muñoz Delgado
description: Repsol garage which sells LPG and connectors

title: (30204) Cartagena - s/n Calle Jorge Juan
description: Free parking (white line), lengthwise, standard size width. 15 minutes from downtown walking. In front of the Hospital de la Caridad. We have slept several times without problems.

title: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 1 Calle Punta Barriga
title_short: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 1 Calle Punta Barriga
description: Parking at the end of a very busy street with beautiful sea views

title: (30203) Cartagena - 10 Calle Ribera de San Javier
title_short: (30203) Cartagena - 10 Calle Ribera de San Javier
description: Parking only. 8 minutes walk from the Center. Good for visiting the city and staying overnight Wednesday there are plenty of flea market cars on the adjoining square.

title: (30203) Cartagena - S/N Paseo Alfonso XIII
description: Free drinking water at the Carrefour station

title: (30203) Cartagena - 3 Ronda de Ferrol
description: Quiet parking next to the municipal library. Ideal for Camper, not for large motorhome. Part a bike path to the center. Walking to the historic center is ten minutes. There are no bodyguards, it's free. Opposite there is a good and cheap bar to eat, have breakfast ... Pharmacy and bakery nearby.

title: (30203) Cartagena - C. Hermano Pedro Ignacio
description: Parking with large spaces, free, without caps. It is at the door of a nursing home, a school and the municipal library. Ten minutes from the old town. In the library there are toilets, Wi-Fi and free newspapers, as well as exhibitions and talks. At night it is quiet, during the day it is noisy. Very close to Mercadona, bars and a hospital.

title: (30370) Cartagena - 5 Pasaje el Rentero
description:
Several pitches in the nature reserve. Beautiful for walking and walking along the beach, but there is no network. There are several parking spaces where you can stand. The access road has only a few potholes and so the journey is actually no problem. Many locals come here for cycling, hiking, etc.  Camping is actually prohibited. There are several garbage cans in which you can dispose of its garbage, so it is very clean - which should stay that way!
From June the access to the Regional Natural Park is possible ONLY with a bus - you have to leave your campervan out of the natural reserve!

title: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 36 Calle Punta Sabinar C. Palos
title_short: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 36 Calle Punta Sabinar C. Palos
description: Parking at the end of Cabo Palo. Small pebble beach below and breathtaking view of the lighthouse and the sea. No shade but little traffic at night. Parking lot saturated during the day.

title: (30203) Cartagena - 4 Avenida Pintor Portela
description:
"La Lavanderia"
Laundromat in Catagena
12 kg for 5 euros 18 kg for 7 euros
Dryer 1 euro for 8 min.
For example, you can park at Lidl for 1 hour for free, if you buy something for more than 15 euros you can stand there for 2 hours for free. Alternatively, you can also park briefly at the Carrefour

title: (30203) Cartagena - 2D Calle Ribera de San Javier
title_short: (30203) Cartagena - 2D Calle Ribera de San Javier
description:
In front of the Cenit shopping center, several free car parks and a blue zone. In the morning, there are police but they do not ask you anything.
Wednesdays market day - closed

title: (03191) Pilar de la Horadada - 5P Urbanización Mil P Parcelas
title_short: (03191) Pilar de la Horadada - 5P Urbanización Mil P Parcelas
description: A large parking near the tenis courts. Very quiet. The only sounds are the tenis balls. 300 M to the beach with water and toilets. Around few restaurants and bars with music but still quiet. Few bóg trees to hide.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 2 Urbanisason Mil P Vistamar
description: Parking of the Viking chiringuito very quiet at night in August

title: (30310) Cartagena -
description: Washing-Dryer

title: (03189) Orihuela - 8 Urbanisason Mil P Vistamar
description: Parking with sea views, it is on a slope but the uppermost spaces have almost no slope, there is an AC and the spaces are long enough for vans. The beach has footbaths and nearby there is a bar area with access to bathrooms.

title: (03191) Pilar de la Horadada - CV-941
description: Place to eat next to the lake. We do not know if the overnight stay is allowed. Small AC and campers.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 14 Urbanisason Mil P Vistamar
description: No amenities

title: (30202) Cartagena - 14 Avenida Sánchez Meca
description: Place next to main road, so it's litle bit noise, but no one want money from you for park here. To city center is 15 minutes by foot.

title: (30202) Cartagena - 9 Paseo Delicias
description: Parking along the street. super quiet. 5 minutes from the historic center.

title: (30204) Cartagena - 16 Avenida Reina Victoria Eugenia
description: Very clean laundry room with free internet connection

title: (30202) Cartagena - 8B Paseo del Muelle
description: Parking area adjacent to 2 restaurants in the port area. No restrictions at all. Next to noisy road and would be noisy overnight but we used it for day parking. Close to town for historic areas.

title: (30205) Cartagena - 14 Calle Sebastián Ferignan
description: Parking with shade of trees, we have spent the day here to escape the sun and have a bit of shade, quite passed but calm, nobody has said anything to us. Next to a road. It has a garbage container and it smells a little but nothing serious. On the corner of the street there is a Shell where you have different services such as laundry, filling and emptying tanks, refueling with gasoline and LPG, washing cars and vans.

title: (30202) Cartagena - 9B Paseo del Muelle
description: Parking with parking attendant, overnight stay possible

title: (30202) Cartagena - 8 Paseo del Muelle
description: Small parking at the edge of a road, but quiet enough, (I slept there on a Sunday evening in July) a little shady.

title: (30202) Cartagena - 7 Calle Pedro Jorquera
description: Small parking lot next to noisy road, suitable for smaller campervans. I left my van here for the day and had no problems. Nobody asked to pay anything.

title: (30202) Cartagena - 30 Paseo Alfonso XII
description: Parking in the center 2 minutes you are at the port and 2 minutes you are in the historic center ... quiet right in front of plaza del toro and the university ... (video surveillance)

title: (30202) Cartagena - 32A Paseo Alfonso XII
description: Parking on the street without disposal and without supply. Here are many shady characters around. That's why we will not spend the night here. It would have been possible. Good for a day visit to the historic old town.

title: (30202) Cartagena - 1 Calle Pez Espada
description: Parking close to the harbour. On workdays it is very busy but free. Arrive late and don't be surprised when a local watchman ask 1 euro fir the night safety. We spent a night without any problem.

title: (30205) Cartagena - 30 Poligono Rambla de Benipila
description: Parking of football field ... near the city to visit and we can sleep without problems

title: (30205) Cartagena - 2W Carretera de Tentegorra
description: Fresh water must also be paid for separately. Wifi was not available. Very noisy road nearby.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 186 Ronda Federico García Lorca
description: We spent 2 nights in this quiet parking lot. the sea is about 500m away

title: (30205) Cartagena - 35 Pasaje los Blases
description: Fuel station, very Cheap, next to shell called Raspoil, also LPG refilling station

title: (30205) Cartagena - 26 Avenida del Cantón
description: The parking lot of an abandoned shopping center. A parking lot (also abandoned) with no time or cost limit. There are surveillance cameras, but they are probably not active. a quiet place to rest and practically no noise. Highly recommended.

title: (30202) Cartagena - 28 Paseo del Muelle
description: Potable water (although the taste is not good), footswitch.  There is a car park opposite the street.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 32 Paseo Marítimo Cmor
description: A quiet and shady place is level the beach is about 10 minutes walk

title: (30205) Cartagena - 8 Calle Juana Jugan
description:
Off street
war able to get parking here after 2pm when the naval yard workers vacated . could probably spent the the night but a lot of road noise. Good sport to visit the town as parking difficult to find in Cartagena

title: (03189) Orihuela - 1 Calle J Monroy Cmor
description: Parking at the edge of the grass and 100m from the beach

title: (30205) Cartagena - 9 Pasaje Subida Coto
description: Quiet parking in front of a foundation, little traffic, only a few walkers and joggers. The foundation building is empty at night. Quiet on Friday evening. Trash available. Three flat seats and possible access between two trees, paying attention to the lower branches.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 11 Calle Miguel de Unamuno
description: Simple open space at the side of the road, not very clean but a little shady, very close to the beach. nothing special

title: (30205) Cartagena - 8 Calle Camelias
description: Parking place to visit Cartagena

title: (30202) Cartagena - 1 Plaza Castillo de San Julian
title_short: (30202) Cartagena - 1 Plaza Castillo de San Julian
description: Best view point. and perfect flat parkings long road and 4x4 only. My car is 6 m,worked.  nice breeze . Did not see any signs.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 35 Calle Rube Darío Cmor
description: Large parking area 100m from the beach. Very quiet with some shady spots. Cycling. Walking. Esplanade. Close to shops and restaurants.

title: (03189) Dehesa de Campoamor - 1 Calle Gloria Fuertes
title_short: (03189) Dehesa de Campoamor - 1 Calle Gloria Fuertes
description: Very large and quiet forest area with picnic tables, 5 minutes walk from the beach and surrounded by a residential area. We have not seen any water sources or bathrooms, (we are not looking for much, the walk is long) it's good to do it only one night (there is no sign that prohibited)

title: (30202) - 2 Pasaje Cala Cortina
description: Land parking, quieter than the one opposite, access to a restaurant that is in the middle of the cove, access to the beach

title: (30202) Cartagena - 11 N-343
description: Parking for about 40 cars, sometimes a little sloping. According to locals, there are no problems here. restaurat right next to it

name: Country Camping in Murcia
title: (30156) Country Camping in Murcia
description: Country Camping near Murcia, a nice, clean site/campsite for 6 motorhomes on a gravelled, walled area. 2 nice, clean and large toilet/shower rooms. Very friendly operator couple. Recommended. Nice one hour bike ride to Murcia possible. Visit our site for more information

title: (03189) Orihuela - 12B Polígono A-1 Aguamarina
description: Mixed parking for the day only at the top of the cliffs. Superb view. Attention it is market place on Thursday

title: (30205) Algameca Chica -
description: Quiet place to spend the night and start the day of excursion!

title: (03189) Orihuela - 1H Polígono A-1 Aguamarina
description: Nice place for washing.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 37R Polígono A-1 Aguamarina
description: Nice little spot to park up for the day and night. lovely view of the sunrise also great spot for snorkeling. parking is free as well.

title: (30205) Algameca Chica -
description:
Make sure you go and check first if it's not occupied. otherwise it's hard to turn around the car. the last 20m of the road are quite rocky. not for everyone may be. 

the area is perfekt for hiking. swimming possible as well. 

very quite. good for 1 motorhome or 2 cars
